#summary RemoteDAO is a class that exposes the generic DAO methods remotely.

= Introduction =

`RemoteDAO` provides a remotable interface to the generic DAO framework. It uses GeneralDAO by default and can be configured to use specific DAO implementations for some or all domain object types.

_NOTE: There are security concerns with exposing the entire database this way. Later we plan to add security configuration, probably with either method-specific or CRUD access per domain object._

Javadoc:
http://hibernate-generic-dao.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/source/doc/com/trg/remote/RemoteDAO.html

= Details =

Spring configuration:
{{{
<!-- without AUTO-WIRE -->
<bean id="remoteDAO" class="com.trg.remote.RemoteDAO">
	<property name="generalDAO" ref="generalDAO"/>
</bean>

<!-- with AUTO-WIRE -->
<bean  id="remoteDAO" class="com.trg.remote.RemoteDAO"/>
}}}

Using a specific implementation for `Project` domain objects...
{{{
<bean id="remoteDAO" class="com.trg.remote.RemoteDAO">
	<property name="generalDAO" ref="generalDAO"/>
	<property name="specificDAOs">
		<map>
			<entry key="com.sample.model.Project" value-ref="projectDAO"/>
		</map>
	</property>
</bean>
}}}
